title: Lorell Sit-to-Stand Electric Desk Multipurpose Desktop Riser, Black
features: Electric for a smooth, easy height-adjust with Simple press of a button
Height ranges: 4-3/8" To 21-5/8" For healthier, sit-stand work life
Includes smooth laminate Top and convenient keyboard tray
Comes with single-monitor Arm and bracket; dual-monitor bracket sold separately
description: Electric sit-to-stand desk riser adjusts up and down with the press of a button so you can easily enjoy the healthier, Sit-Stand approach to work. Adjust work surface from 4-3/8" To 21-5/8" Off your desk. Design includes stylish design, laminate top panel and keyboard tray. Aluminum base features a Black powder-coat finish for durability. Electric desk riser with keyboard tray includes a single-monitor arm and bracket. Optional dual-monitor bracket is sold separately.
